div.div:
3. my_wrapper_script.sh は
SIGTERM を無視

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 78px; height: 1px; padding-top: 102px; margin-left: 85px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
2.PID1 のプロセスに
SIGTERM が投げられる

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 557px; margin-left: 294px;

div.div:
4.PID1 のプロセスに
SIGKILL が投げられる

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 457px; margin-left: 255px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
5. my_wrapper_script.sh は
強制終了する

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 837px; margin-left: 294px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
6. PID1 のプロセスが kill された後コンテナは停止のために
コンテナ内すべてのプロセス(django, postgres)を強制終了する

switch.text: 6. PID1 のプロセスが kill された後コンテナは停止のために...

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
